import re

def simplify_text(text):
    # Split into sentences
    sentences = text.split('. ')

    # Simplify each sentence
    simplified_sentences = []
    for sentence in sentences:
        # Remove passive voice
        sentence = re.sub(r'^(did|were|was|been|being|has|have|had) .+ past participle', r'\1ing', sentence)
        # Remove noun-heavy words
        sentence = re.sub(r'\b(a|an|the|and|of|to|in|on|at|by|with)\b .+ noun', r'\1ing', sentence)
        # Shorten sentence length
        if len(sentence) > 20:
            sentence = sentence[:15] + '...'
        simplified_sentences.append(sentence)

    # Join simplified sentences back into text
    simplified_text = '. '.join(simplified_sentences)
    return simplified_text
